page.shortlink: api client api a5 u element shown method

argument.name: element
argument.description: A pointer to a DOM element or the ID of an element.

page.description: Whether or not an element is shown.

discussion.p: The A5.u.element.shown() method can be used to detect if an element is currently shown. If the element or any of its parents are not displayed, then the method will return "false". Otherwise the method will return "true".
